section.title: TODO - Support for binding the EntityManager and EntityManagerFactory in JNDI
section.para:
JBoss-5.0 GA does NOT support binding the EntityManager and EntityManagerFactory in JNDI, using the following properties in persistence.xml:
<persistence> <persistence-unit name="manager1"> ... <properties> <property name="jboss.entity.manager.jndi.name" value="java:/Manager1"/> <property name="jboss.entity.manager.factory.jndi.name" value="java:/Manager1Factory"/> </properties> </persistence-unit> </persistence>
We are tracking this in our EJBTHREE JIRA.
